short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making Encyclopædia Iranica articles easier to read online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for making Encyclopædia Iranica articles easier to read online.

This extension reformats the article pages on http://www.iranicaonline.org/ for easy reading.

For details please refer to https://github.com/moos/iranica-reader.

NOTE: This is NOT an official extension.  No guarantee of accuracy is made when this extension is used. To get the exact original article, open the page incognito or disable the extension.
